subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Offensive coordinator Norm Chow is staying at U.C.L.A., rebuffing overtures from Trojans Coach Lane Kiffin to return to the University of Southern California.
snippet: Offensive coordinator Norm Chow is staying at U.C.L.A., rebuffing overtures from Trojans Coach Lane Kiffin to return to the University of Southern California.
